text: wan ni sing di «thanghlay di thuk xnumati kæ phwk cea læw læa xahar khxng brrda phu thi di rab khamphir nan pen thi xnumati kæ phwk cea læw læa xahar khxng phwk cea k pen thi xnumati kæ phwk khea læa brrda hying brisuththi nı hmu phu sraththa hying læa brrda hying brisuththi nı hmu phu thi di rab khamphir kxn cak phwk cea k pen xnumati kæ phwk cea dwy meux phwk cea di mxb hı kæ phwk nang sung ma har khxng phwk nangnı thana pen phu tængngan michı pen phu kratha kar si na doy peidphey læa michı yud xea nang pen pheuxn doy kratha si na lab «læa phu dı ptiseth kar sraththa nænxn ngan khxng khea k ri phl khna deiywkan nı wan prlok phwk khea ca xyu nı hmu phu thi khadthun
